channel.title: Xamarin on Troy Kershaw's Website

item.title: Xamarin.Forms and F# in a Minute
item.description: F# works quite well with Xamarin.Forms. At September’s Sydney F# User Group meeting I gave a talk on how to get started by building a Twitter app that randomly selects a tweet to give a prize to. I plan to write a detailed How To, but for now, enjoy the video! Thanks for watching.
